scripts.start: watchman watch-del-all && clear && npx react-native start --reset-cache
scripts.android:clean: yarn cache clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && clear
scripts.ios:clean: yarn cache clean && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && cd ios && rm -rf /build && rm -rf /Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && cd .. && clear
scripts.clean: yarn cache clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && cd ios && rm -rf /build && rm -rf /Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && cd .. && rm -rf /node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && npx pod-install && say completed
